pageTitle: Titanfall beats Hobbit on UK chart | GamesIndustry.biz

textBeforeTable: UKIE Games Charts courtesy of GfK Chart-Track The boost kept new entry LEGO The Hobbit away from the top spot and had it settling for second place, but still far ahead of this week's other new entries. Kinect Sports: Rivals only managed to enter at 14, while Don Bradman Cricket 14 missed the top twenty entirely and debuted at 34. The launch of the Xbox 360 version has pushed EA's Titanfall back up to number one from three, with 71 per cent of sales for the 360, 27 per cent on Xbox One and a tiny 1 per cent on PC. 360 release pushes EA's mechs back to top spot Mon 14 Apr 2014 9:06am GMT / 5:06am EDT / 2:06am PDT Retail Tweet By Rachel Weber Titanfall beats Hobbit on UK chart Retail Register Log in Go Articles Jobs Directory
